title: TerraPing
blurb: A wireless soil moisture sensor that communicates via ESPâ€‘NOW and integrates with HomeKit. Built for low-power deployment and seamless garden automation.

title: Gracie
blurb: A robotic arm and camera system powered by ROS2, designed for precise manipulation tasks. Features depth sensing, object tracking, and autonomous pick-and-place routines.

title: FloraByte
blurb: An intelligent countertop garden system that monitors plant health and growth. Designed for smart homes with Wi-Fi connectivity and nutrient automation.

title: RoboRover
blurb: An autonomous mobile robot using ROS2 for navigation, SLAM, and obstacle avoidance. Ideal for autonomous exploration and mapping challenges.

title: AquaCore
blurb: A proof-of-concept hydroponics system with real-time environmental sensing. Compact, efficient, and perfect for testing smart agriculture ideas.

title: HiveMind
blurb: A custom solver for the multiple traveling salesmen problem (mTSP). Optimizes routing for teams of agents in delivery, robotics, and logistics scenarios.

title: VaporIQ
blurb: A precision gas density sensor with onboard data logging. Developed for SF6 analysis and environmental monitoring applications.

title: EchoLux
blurb: An LED matrix that dances in real-time to live audio input. Merges sound and light for interactive installations and music-reactive displays.
